actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from the social security tax on self-employment income certain amounts received by insurance salesmen after retirement.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to exclude from the social security tax on self-employment income amounts received by a former insurance salesman after retirement if: (1) such amounts are deferred or renewal commissions on policies sold before retirement; and (2) such salesman was not an employee for tax purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from the social security tax on self-employment income certain amounts received by insurance salesmen after retirement.
